tool_description:
NO Word Limit

name: DeepL API
title: DeepL API

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.description: When you post the language and text to the api, it returns the translated version
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deepl-api5.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepl-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://deepl-api5.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deepl-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
